General.Name: SJ Group Co. Ltd
General.Description: SJ Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells backpacks, hats, children's clothing, innerwear, and women's wear. Its brands include KANGOL, KANGOL KIDS, HELLEN KAMINSKI, and BOODY. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: East English Language Center, Seoul, South Korea, 06226
